value.name: Harry and Meghan call for urgent change to protect children on social media
value.description: It comes after a US Congressional hearing on the issue where Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg apologised to parents of children who killed themselves over online abuse. | ITV National News

value.name: Duke and Duchess of Sussex working on a 'bunch' of Netflix projects
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are developing “a bunch” of projects with Netflix including documentaries and a film, according to a senior executive at the streaming giant. The firm’s chief content officer Bela Bajaria told a Hollywood event the couple’s projects include “a couple of unscripted things” and a series.

value.name: Meghan Markle's ghost memoir causing problems already as she's issued major warning
value.description: After quitting the royal family in 2020, Harry and Meghan signed a lucrative book deal with Penguin Random House.

value.name: King Charles gave Meghan Markle a meaningful nickname despite royal drama
value.description: King Charles had a no-nonsense nickname for Meghan Markle despite the drama unfolding within the Royal Family.

value.name: Harry and Meghan share rare and emotional message as they call for urgent change to child safety online
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have issued a rare and emotional message on child safety on social media. Harry and Meghan spoke out after chief executives of Meta, TikTok, X and other social media giants gave evidence before the US Senate Judiciary Committee on Wednesday.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's latest film project revealed - report
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have a busy year ahead. The couple – who signed with Netflix in 2020 – have several projects in the works, including an upcoming movie. Asked about the royal duo's slate, Netflix's Chief Content Officer Bela Bajaria confirmed: "They have a couple of unscripted things they're working on with Brandon [Reigg].

value.name: Alison Hammond screams, falls and runs away from cows as This Morning descends into chaos
value.description: The This Morning presenter, 48, ran screaming from cows, took a little tumble, and even downed a shot of whisky at the former Top Gear presenter’s Oxfordshire farm. value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Share Emotional Message After Senate Child Safety Hearing
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are expressing their support following the U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee's hearing on online safety for children on Wednesday.
